title: Drawing, "Design for Wall Assemblage with Floor Lamp", 1980s
medium: Black and color marking pens, crayon, graphite on white tracing paper
description: At the end of a room whose walls and ceiling are drawn in perspective, is rear wall painted bright green with shapes "floating" on green ground.  One pyramid shape, viewed from above, appears to project into the room.  A floor lamp composed of tall triangular panels stands in front of painted wall.  On the wall to right of decorated wall is small, box-shaped relief with yellow ground.  A black irregular "blob," to left of lamp may represent a table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Wall Assemblage with Floor Lamp", 1980s.
1980s. Black and color marking pens, crayon, graphite on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-307.
